alert.note: Alert for Chambers (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 12 at 5:52PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN CHAMBERS COUNTY... At 551 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Amity Park to 6 miles northwest of Ridge Grove, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Stroud, La Fayette, Lakeview, Five Points, Fredonia, Post Oak Forks, Veasey Creek Park, Denson, Amity Park, Standing Rock, Welch, Penton, Buffalo, Southern Harbor, White Plains, Rocky Point and Stroud Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
